publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7956 Elaine Smith: Congratulations to St Barbara’s Primary—That the Parliament congratulates St Barbara’s Primary School, Muirhead, on being awarded a British Council Full International School Award for 2010-2013; notes that this award recognises schools which are committed to raising awareness and understanding of other countries, and acknowledges that St Barbara’s, the first school in North Lanarkshire to receive this accolade, has also won North Lanarkshire Council’s International School award for two years running. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, John Wilson*, Stuart McMillan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-7956 Congratulations to St Barbara’s Primary (lodged on 16 February 2011) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-7956 Congratulations to St Barbara’s Primary (lodged on 16 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-7956 Congratulations to St Barbara’s Primary (lodged on 16 February 2011) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-7956 Congratulations to St Barbara’s Primary (lodged on 16 February 2011) Hugh Henry*
